nodes.text: Hoar Chall Ring Drive Gel was a podracer lubricant manufactured by Haor Chall Engineering, a company founded by the Xi Char. Haor Chall and this product were one of two main sponsors for the Vinta Harvest Classic podrace on Malastare.

In Emissaries to Malastare, Fode's speech bubble spells the product "Hoar Chall Ring Drive Jell," however, the actual bottle of the product he is holding in his hand spells the "Jell" correctly as "Gel."
